headline: Visa Unveils 2025 Creator Report; Introduces Creator Agent Pilot with Karat
summary: SAN FRANCISCO & LISBON, Portugal, November 11, 2025--At Web Summit 2025 today, Visa Inc. (V) strengthened its long-standing commitment to supporting digital creators as a powerful force in the global economy. Building on its recognition of creators as small businesses, Visa is using the scale of its network to help creators easily and securely pay and get paid, access capital and grow their enterprises with the same tools and resources available to small businesses worldwide.

raw.headline: Visa Unveils 2025 Creator Report; Introduces Creator Agent Pilot with Karat
raw.summary: SAN FRANCISCO & LISBON, Portugal, November 11, 2025--At Web Summit 2025 today, Visa Inc. (V) strengthened its long-standing commitment to supporting digital creators as a powerful force in the global economy. Building on its recognition of creators as small businesses, Visa is using the scale of its network to help creators easily and securely pay and get paid, access capital and grow their enterprises with the same tools and resources available to small businesses worldwide.
